thread.title: LSU football game versus South Carolina moved to Baton Rouge
thread.title_full: LSU football game versus South Carolina moved to Baton Rouge

author: brian.j.pellerin@gmail.com(bpelle3)
title: LSU football game versus South Carolina moved to Baton Rouge
text:
by Brian Pellerin The LSU football game against South Carolina this Saturday has been moved to Baton Rouge, the Southeastern Conference announced Tuesday morning. State and school officials decided the flooding and the ongoing recovery effort in South Carolina made moving the game the best option. SEC officials, along with both schools and television networks, are still deciding on a kickoff time. 
“In the spirit of supporting our South Carolina community that is so supportive of Gamecock Nation, we have decided to move the game to Baton Rouge,” said USC President Harris Pastides in a press release. “The stress on law enforcement and first responders is too great. Moreover, we’ve had many in the Carolina family directly impacted by the flooding.” 
LSU officials were not immediately available for comment. 
We’ll have more information as it becomes available.
